segments.text: Yes , sir . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Um , this steak , I asked for to be medium rare .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Medium rare , that ’ s right , sir . I remember your order .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ m afraid it isn ’ t . It ’ s a bit too well done and rather tough . Would you mind changing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If it is not to your satisfaction , I ’ ll certainly bring you another . But I ’ m afraid you may have to wait for a few minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that ’ s all right . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
